title: Ultimate Audio Visualizer
appdescription: The 'Play' button is used to play and pause the current song, which can be changed using the 'Track' dropdown menu. The 'Volume' slider adjusts volume and the 'Full Screen' button puts the app in full screen. You can toggle various audio visualization options on and off using the checkboxes, such as using a type of RGB shift that creates a kind of disco ball effect (AKA 'Party Mode'!). Finally, the visualization data type can be changed between 'frequency' and 'waveform' using the 'Visualizaton Data Type' dropdown menu.
